conflicts.description: cdo: The configuration does not support GRIB1
conflicts.name: +szip

conflicts.description: cdo: GCC 9 changed OpenMP data sharing behavior
conflicts.name: %gcc@9:

conflicts.description: cdo: Compilation with gcc@14: requires cdo@2.2.2:
conflicts.name: %gcc@14:

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependencies.name: curl

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
ecCodes is a package developed by ECMWF for processing meteorological
data in GRIB (1/2), BUFR (3/4) and GTS header formats.
dependencies.name: eccodes

dependencies.description:
NVPL FFT (NVIDIA Performance Libraries FFT) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries and provides Fast Fourier Transform (FFT)
calculations on ARM CPUs.
dependencies.name: fftw-api

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: fortran

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
The ECMWF GRIB API is an application program interface accessible from
C, FORTRAN and Python programs developed for encoding and decoding WMO
FM-92 GRIB edition 1 and edition 2 messages. The API was deprecated
https://www.ecmwf.int/en/newsletter/152/news/end-road-grib-api in favor
of ecCodes.
dependencies.name: grib-api

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
dependencies.name: libxml2

dependencies.description:
Magics is the latest generation of the ECMWF's Meteorological plotting
software MAGICS. Although completely redesigned in C++, it is intended
to be as backwards-compatible as possible with the Fortran interface.
dependencies.name: magics

dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.
dependencies.name: netcdf-c

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.
dependencies.name: proj

dependencies.description:
Szip is an implementation of the extended-Rice lossless compression
algorithm. It provides lossless compression of scientific data, and is
provided with HDF software products.
dependencies.name: szip

dependencies.description: Util-linux is a suite of essential utilities for any Linux system.
dependencies.name: uuid

dependent_to.description:
The cdo package provides an interface to the Climate Data Operators from
Python.
dependent_to.name: py-cdo

description:
CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse
Climate and NWP model Data.
name: cdo

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Ignore the built-in support and use the external GRIB2 backend for GRIB1 files
variants.name: external-grib1

variants.description: Enable PROJ library for cartographic projections
variants.name: proj
